## üöÄ Sazkirin

Ji Pypi saz bikin:

```bash
pip install pyhelper-tools-jbhm
```

---

## üìñ Overview

** Pyhelper ** Versatile Python Toolkit e ku ji bo h√™sankirina ** Anal√Æz√™n daney√™, d√Ætbar√Æ, operasyon√™n stat√Æst√Æk√Æ, √ª kar√™n karg√™riy√™ ** .  
Ew di nav projey√™n akadem√Æk, l√™kol√Æn, l√™kol√Æn, √ª profesyonel, l√™kol√Æn, l√™kol√Ænan de, dih√™le ku h√ªn ji bil√Æ koda kovar√™ bal√™ biki≈ü√Ænin.

Avantaj√™n sereke:
- üßÆ Stat√Æst√Æk √ª Utiliy√™n Math-√™ y√™n √ß√™kir√Æ **
- üìä Easy-to-Bikaran√Æna ** Kar√ªbar√™n Visualization Daney√™n ** 
- üóÇ Handy ** Kar √ª l√™ger√Æna pel√™ ** 
- üîç ** Valitation Syntax ** ji bo Python pelan
- üåç ** Pi≈ütgiriya Multi-Ziman ** Bi wergerandin√™n amade-bikar b√Ænin
- üöÄ Ji bo ** PROTOTYPING FAST ** √ª ** Perwerde ** 

---

## ‚ú® Taybetmendiy√™n sereke

### üìä Visualization Daney√™n
- Bar Charts: horizontal & vertical (`hbar`, `vbar`)  
- Daxuyaniy√™n belavkirin√™: Histograms (`histo`), plots box (`boxplot`), plots KDE (`kdeplot`)  
- Li ser nex≈üey√™n tevl√Æhev: violin, swarm, plan√™n hi≈ük  
- Anal√Æzkirina t√™kiliy√™: Heatmaps (`heatmap`), plan√™n belavkirin√™ (`scatter`)  
- Visualizasyon√™n p√™≈ükeft√Æ: Plots cot, plan√™n hevbe≈ü, nex≈üey√™n regresyon√™  
- Tabloy√™n Data: Tabloya Formatkir√Æ (`table`) n√Æ≈üan dide  

### üìà anal√Æz√™n stat√Æst√Æk√Æ
- ** Tenduristiya Navend√Æ ** : wateya (`get_media`), median (`get_median`), mode (`get_moda`)  
- ** Dispersion ** : Rada (`get_rank`), variance (`get_var`), devjiya standard (`get_desv`)  
- ** Analysis ** : Parastina belavkirin√™ (`disp`), hesab√™n IQR, normal√Æzasyon, veguher√Æn√™n ≈üert  
- ** Detection Outlier ** : Method√™n IQR √ª Z-Score  

### üóÇÔ∏è Bir√™vebirina Pel√™
- Kif≈ükirina Smart bi œÄ25_ (auto-detect CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)  
- Pi≈ütgiriya pir-forma (CSV, JSON, XML, PDF, spatial data)  
- Bir√™vebirina Databas√™ SQL bi `DataBase` √ß√Æna  
- Vebijark√™n Veguheztin√™ (`convert_file`)  

Am√ªr√™n P√™≈ük√™≈üvan√™ ### üõ†Ô∏è
- Pergala Switch (`Switch`, `AsyncSwitch`)  
- Syntax check (`check_syntax`, `PythonFileChecker`)  
- Raporkirina Error Re≈ü œÄ18_  
- Pergala Al√Ækariya Yekgirt√Æ (`help`)  

### üåç Navnetewey√Æ
- 100+ werger√™n √ß√™kir√Æ  
- wergera xwer√ª  
- Ziman Runtime Veguhestina œÄ16_1_15_``python
from helper import set_language

set_language("en")  # English
set_language("es")  # Spanish
set_language("fr")  # French
set_language("de")  # German
set_language("ru")  # Russian
set_language("tr")  # Turkish
set_language("zh")  # Chinese
set_language("it")  # Italian
set_language("pt")  # Portuguese
set_language("sv")  # Swedish
set_language("ja")  # Japanese
set_language("ar")  # Arabic
...
```


### Stat√Æst√Æk√™n bingeh√Æn
```python
import helper as hp

data = [1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5]

print(hp.get_media(data))   # Mean
print(hp.get_median(data))  # Median
print(hp.get_moda(data))    # Mode
```

### D√Æwar√Æ
```python
import helper as hp

df = hp.pd.DataFrame({"values": [5, 3, 7, 2, 9]})
hp.histo(df, "values", bins=5, title="Sample Histogram")
```

### Karan√Æna pel√™
```python
from helper import call

data = call(name="my_data", type="csv")  # Finds and loads a CSV file automatically
```

Werger√™n nav##%#
```python
from helper import load_user_translations

# Load custom translations from lang.json
load_user_translations("custom/lang.json")
```

### Rast√Ækirina Syntax
```python
from helper import run

run("./path/to/my_script.py")
#Show gui pop up with results
```

---

Struktura Projey√™ ## üìÇ

```
helper/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ __init__.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lang/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ en.json
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ es.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ... (100+ files)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ submodules/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graph.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ statics.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ caller.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ checker.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manager.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pyswitch.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ shared.py
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DBManager.py
```

- C√ªrey√™n Visualization y√™n Z√™de

- Pi≈ütgiriya databases dir√™jkir√Æ (NoSQL, graph databases)

- Yekb√ªna f√™rb√ªna mak√Æney√™

- Navbera navg√Æniya malper√™

- Pergala p√™vek√™
